dmca.title: Google DMCA - Beijingtrip
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255

FROM: Catherine He
Beijingtrip.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 513Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349
E-mail: tcgmail_2002@yahoo.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
PAGE: 5
DATE: December 6, 2006 Sent via fax and email.

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.beijingtrip.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.chinahighlights.com, whom belongs to CITS (China International Travel Service) Guilin. They copied a quantity of contents from our website as listed below without our authorization. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages.

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:

Search Query "History of Beijing Hutong"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/courtyard.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010630122248/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/courtyard.htm (June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijingihutong/couryard_culture.htm

Search Query `"Why are Beijing's lanes called Hutong"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/history.htm http://web.archive.org/web/20011121204352/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/history.htm (November 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/hutong/history_of_hutong.htm

Search Query "The name of a hutong implicates its origin, location or history" (show all results)
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/culture.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409215822/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/culture.htm (April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/hutong/hutong_culture.htm

Search Query "Hutong Tour"
our Copyrighted page:
http:/www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/tour.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010410000544/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/tour.htm (April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/hutong/hutong_tour.htm

Search Query "what is Hutong"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/hutong.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010409235346/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/hutong/hutong.htm (April 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/hutong/what_is_hutong.htm

Search Query "Ming tombs"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.cornlartractions/mingtomb.htm http://web.archive.org/web/20041013015850/http://www.beijingtrip.cotnlattractiors/m ingtomb.htm (October 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
littpi/www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/mingiombs/mingiombs.htm

Search Query "Grand View Garden"
our Copyrighted page:
http://www.beijingtrip.com/artractions/grandview.htm
http://web.archive.org/web/20010628230712/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/grandview.htm
(June 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/otherattractions/grand_view_garden.htm

Search Query "summer palace Back Lake"
Our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20030224140505/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/back_lake.htm (they copied our old version of February 2003)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/summer_palace/bronze.htm

Search Query "summer palace East Palace Gate"
Our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20011121205056/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attract/onasummer/gate.htm (they copied our old version of November 2001 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/summer_palace/east_palace_gate.htm

Search Query "summer palace Hall of Benevolent Longevity"
Our Copyrighted page: http://web.archive.org/web/20021021105823/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/benevolence.htm (they copied our old version of October 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/summer_palace/hall_of_benevolence.htm

Search Query "summer palace Hall of Dispelling Clouds"
Our Copyrighted page: http://web.archive.org/web/20021021111121/http://www.beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/hall.htm (they copied our old version of October 2002 version)
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.chinahighlights.com/beijing/summer_palace/hall_of_dispelling.htm

Search Query "summer palace Long Gallery"
Our Copyrighted page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20020612140855/http://beijingtrip.com/attractions/summer/longgallery.htm (they copied our old version of June 2002 version)

Search Query "summer palace Seventeen
